name: Geo Gravity (mholtz, TheBruceSwain, qkdtpgus1225)
description:
In a geometric universe where the laws of gravity do not behave normally, Geo is a cube puppy that got lost and is now trying to make its way back home.

Geo Gravity is a 2.5D platformer gamethat plays around with the idea of gravity and defying the law of physics. 

Created by: Mariana Holtz, Jackson Westbrook, Heidi Bang, and Emily Xie
